problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): A 84-year-old man was talking to his 24 year old friend about how much politics has changed in just the last few decades. Though the 24 year old complained about how things were much better way back before all these changes, the 84-year-old took a much more optimistic view and was overall happy with the politics of today.
Question: Who is resistant to change?
ans0: The 84-year-old
ans1: The 24 year old
ans2: Cannot answer
